name: LXIV
description:
LXIV is a tiny game within a 64x64 resolution.

The rules are simple. Move your mouse cursor around the tiny screen. Avoid lasers. Lasers will appear thin and harmless at first, then widen out and must be dodged.

This game was inspired by Blackthornprod's 64x64 game challenge. I made it in just a few hours.

Please don't press the blue fullscreen button (which I can't get rid of)
